actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that farmers may drop out an additional 2 years of low earnings in the computation of their benefits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that farmers may drop out an additional two years of low earnings in the computation of their benefits under title II of the Social Security Act (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance). (Amends 42 U.S.C. 415)

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that farmers may drop out an additional 2 years of low earnings in the computation of their benefits under the old-age, survivors, and disability insurance system.
